post:
Cloud-based PHP hosting that will skyrocket your website's performance and uptime to a whole new level!

JavaPipe's PHP hosting is a brand new product that the company launched in 2016. It includes the Softaculous app installer that enables you to install more than 400 different CMS and applications with just a single click.

Each PHP hosting account is completely isolated for maximum security. The web hosting nodes are powered by CloudStack, CentOS 7 and ultra-fast SSD storage backends.

The SiteWorx control panel guarantees comfortable management of your web hosting while you also receive SSH and SFTP access to manage your website.


PHP Cloud Hosting
  • Easy SiteWorx Control Panel
  • One-Click CMS Installation: 400+ Apps!
  • Multiple PHP Versions: 4.4 to 7.0
  • Secure & Isolated Hosting Account
  • Free SSL Certificate
  • Unlimited MySQL Databases
  • Fast SSD Storage
  • Automated Daily Backups
  • Blazing Fast 24/7 Support
Starting at $2.60/mo! -> PHP Hosting Plans




PHP Hosting Features
===
  • SiteWorx Control Panel
  • CMS Installer (400+ Apps)
  • PHP Versions 4.4 - 7.0
  • SSD Storage
  • Unlimited MySQL Databases
  • SSH & SFTP Access
  • Daily Off-site Backups
  • Unlimited Alias Domains
  • Unlimited Subdomains
  • Unlimited E-Mail Accounts
  • Cronjobs
  • SSL/HTTPS Support
  • Spam & Virus Filtration
  • Webmail
  • Visitor Statistics
  • Custom Error Pages
  • E-Mail Forwarding
  • E-Mail Auto Responder
  • E-Mail Catchall
  • Git Client
  • IonCube Loaders
  • Free SSL Certificate


Available PHP Modules: apc, apcu, bcmath, bz2, bz2_filter, calendar, Core, ctype, curl, date, dba, dom, enchant, ereg, exif, fileinfo, filter, ftp, gd, gettext, gmp, hash, http, iconv, imap, ionCube Loader, json, ldap, libxml, mailparse, mbstring, mcrypt, mhash, mysql, mysqli, mysqlnd, openssl, pcntl, pcre, PDO, pdo_mysql, pdo_sqlite, Phar, posix, propro, pspell, raphf, readline, Reflection, session, shmop, SimpleXML, snmp, soap, sockets, SourceGuardian, SPL, sqlite3, standard, sysvmsg, sysvsem, sysvshm, tidy, tokenizer, wddx, xml, xmlreader, xmlrpc, xmlwriter, xsl, Zend Guard Loader, Zend OPcache, zip, zlib
